import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface Car { model: string; doors: number; seats: number; transmission: string; cost: number; image: string; year: number; } @Component({ selector: 'app-carslist', templateUrl: './carslist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carslist.component.css'] }) export class CarslistComponent { carsLister: Car[] = [ { model: 'Suzuki', doors: 4, seats: 5, transmission: 'manual', year: 2018, cost: 100, image: '/assets/images/carslistbg.jpg', }, { model: 'Suzuki', doors: 4, seats: 5, transmission: 'manual', year: 2018, cost: 100, image: '/assets/images/carslistbg.jpg', }, { model: 'Suzuki', doors: 4, seats: 5, transmission: 'manual', cost: 100, year: 2018, image: '/assets/images/carslistbg.jpg', }, { model: 'Suzuki', doors: 4, seats: 5, transmission: 'manual', cost: 100, year: 2018, image: '/assets/images/carslistbg.jpg', }, { model: 'Suzuki', doors: 4, seats: 5, transmission: 'manual', cost: 100, year: 2018, image: '/assets/images/carslistbg.jpg', }, { model: 'Suzuki', doors: 4, seats: 5, transmission: 'manual', year: 2018, cost: 100, image: '/assets/images/carslistbg.jpg', }, { model: 'Suzuki', doors: 4, seats: 5, transmission: 'manual', year: 2018, cost: 100, image: '/assets/images/carslistbg.jpg', }, ] }

Our Car Park

Here you can find our list of all available cars. You can pick the one like.

${{car.cost}}/day
